name: MySQL5

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT count(1) FROM work_item WHERE IS_DELETED = '0' AND RELEASE_ID = t1.`ID`)
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: ALL_WORK_ITEMS

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT count(1) FROM work_item WHERE IS_DELETED = '0' AND `STATE` in (select ID from work_item_state where TYPE = 'completed') AND RELEASE_ID = t1.`ID`)
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: COMPLETED_WORK_ITEMS

queryCode:
SELECT
(SELECT count(1) FROM work_item WHERE IS_DELETED = '0' AND RELEASE_ID = t1.`ID`) AS `ALL_WORK_ITEMS`,
t1.`ASSIGNEE_ID`,
t1.`ASSIGNEE_NAME`,
t1.`CATEGORIES`,
t1.`CHANGELOG`,
(SELECT count(1) FROM work_item WHERE IS_DELETED = '0' AND `STATE` in (select ID from work_item_state where TYPE = 'completed') AND RELEASE_ID = t1.`ID`) AS `COMPLETED_WORK_ITEMS`,
t1.`CREATE_MAN`,
t1.`CREATE_TIME`,
t1.`DESCRIPTION`,
t1.`END_AT`,
(year(t1.`END_AT`)) AS `END_YEAR`,
t1.`ID`,
t1.`NAME`,
t1.`PROJECT_ID`,
t11.`IS_DELETED` AS `PROJECT_IS_DELETED`,
t11.`NAME` AS `PROJECT_NAME`,
t11.`TYPE` AS `PROJECT_TYPE`,
t1.`START_AT`,
t1.`STATUS`,
t1.`UPDATE_MAN`,
t1.`UPDATE_TIME`
FROM `PROJECT_RELEASE` t1 
LEFT JOIN `PROJECT` t11 ON t1.`PROJECT_ID` = t11.`ID`
